snippet: The police escorted Pervez Musharraf, the country’s former military leader, back to court a day after his dramatic escape when a judge revoked his bail.
abstract: Pakistan police escort former military ruler Pervez Musharraf  from his home to Islamabad court, one day his after dramatic escape when a judge revoked his bail; less than five years after wielding absolute power, Musharraf is latest example of Pakistani judiciary’s increasing willingness to pursue previously untouchable levels of society, even to top ranks of military.
lead_paragraph: The police escorted Pervez Musharraf, the country’s former military leader, back to court a day after his dramatic escape when a judge revoked his bail.

headline.seo: Facing Arrest, Musharraf Flees Pakistani Courtroom
headline.main: Musharraf, Fleeing Once, Is Brought Back to Court to Face Charges
headline.print_headline: Musharraf, Fleeing Once, Is Brought Back to Court to Face Charges
